meanings.definition: The art or process of decorating metal with intricate patterns using inlaid gold or silver.
meanings.sent1: The damascening on the sword was so detailed and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed exquisite examples of damascening on ancient armor.
meanings.sent3: The knight joked that his armor was so shiny after damascening, it blinded his enemies.
meanings.sent4: The tradition of damascening has been passed down through generations like a precious heirloom.
meanings.sent5: The intricate damascening on the shield seemed to come alive in the flickering torchlight.

meanings.definition: To decorate metal with intricate patterns using inlaid gold or silver.
meanings.sent1: The skilled artisan was damascening the dagger with great care.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to damascen jewelry during her apprenticeship.
meanings.sent3: The blacksmith joked that he was damascening so much, his hands were starting to sparkle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter damascened the room with joy and light.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hands moved swiftly, damascening the metal with precision and artistry.
